sentences.en: A measure of the interdependence among modules in a computer program.
sentences.cn: 一种计算机程序中模块之间相互依赖的一种量度.

sentences.en: By the same token , the everlasting interdependence is actually an everlasting love.
sentences.cn: 正如, 永远的依存,也是永远的爱.

sentences.en: Digitization is moving the forces toward joint interdependence.
sentences.cn: 数字化正推动军队朝联合相互依存方向发展.

sentences.en: Howeer, we must achieve independence before we can choose interdependence.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此,在能够选择相互依赖之前, 我们必须取得独立.

sentences.en: Interdependence theory presents logical analysis of the interdependent relationship between s individuals.
sentences.cn: 人际互倚理论主要关注群体中个体之间的相互依附关系.

sentences.en: Music is an art form with interdependence of universality and individuality.
sentences.cn: 音乐是共性与个性相互依存的艺术生命体.

sentences.en: Our objective is to move progressively on a maturity continuum from dependence to independence to interdependence.
sentences.cn: 我们的目标是,从依赖到独立、再到互相依赖,在成熟连续流中循序渐进.

sentences.en: Some argue that economic interdependence is enough to hold us together.
sentences.cn: 有人认为经济上的相互依赖足以把我们联系在一起.

sentences.en: The complex interdependence between people demands a high degree of self - discipline and awareness.
sentences.cn: 人与人之间的复杂的相互依存性,要求有一种高度的自觉纪律和相互之间的了解.

sentences.en: The hows and whys of this growing economic interdependence will unfold in the remaining chapters.
sentences.cn: 经济上日益增长的这种相互依赖的方式及原因,将在其余各章中展开论述.

sentences.en: The relation between viruses and man is the relation of autoeciousness , confrontation? co - existence and interdependence.
sentences.cn: 病毒与人类的关系,是寄生与对抗 、 共存与依赖的关系.

sentences.en: The theory of comparative advantage. so that the interdependence of economies. the impact on each other.
sentences.cn: 比较利益理论. 使各经济体相互依赖. 相互影响.

sentences.en: This interdependence will be further examined at a later point.
sentences.cn: 这种相互依存关系在后面还会作进一步的分析.

sentences.en: This is a basic law of interdependence.
sentences.cn: 这些一条相互依赖的法则.

sentences.en: We are all vulnerable and need interdependence .
sentences.cn: 我们都是脆弱的，需要互相依赖。

words.tran_cn: 相互联系，相互沟通；互相联络
互相来往，交流；各教派间举行的圣餐

trans.tran_en: a situation in which people or things depend on each other
